name: BSDium
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
"BSCD is the circulating token of MStation, where most of the actions will consume BSCD, such as leveling up the character, PVE, item repair and so on. You could earn BSCD form Daily Mining and PVE, as well as trading on BSCStation Swap.
The BSCD that users pay in game will be mostly used in burning or treasury, and will be rewarded to users via activities and missions in the future."
